Magmeld Emissary Prieta:
Long ago were the heroes chosen by the gods,and those who didn't deserve their blessing. About those times were only legends that now almost nobody remembers it. Once I also belonged to the ignorant, unacquainted with the true history of days past.
But in Marmalde I learned the truth. Knows her and is Happy. Oh, it's terrible...
You met with the Head of the Delegation, Magolda Rada in the Village Hunters?
